creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: underwater scene: orange, yellow, pink, and mustard colored corals on a rock with green seaweed; two small seahorses in the background of image near top
inscription: Left: [自刻　一九五二年作　龍の落し子] {Jikoku, 1952nen saku, ?????}; bottom, in pencil: [Seahorses] [Toshi Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Sea Horses
